#summary The commands that are supported. They must be preceded by the command keyword.

= Commands =

  * Selection
    The commands {{{begin select}}} and {{{end select}}}.

  * Color
    The command {{{flip}}} will reverse the colors of the background and text.
  
  * Direction
    Move the caret either {{{up}}}, {{{down}}}, {{{left}}}, or {{{right}}}.

  * Space
    Adds a {{{space}}}.

  * Open/Save
    Will {{{open}}} a saved file or {{{save}}} what is currently displayed.

  * Exit
    Will {{{exit}}} the program.
